app.code_snippet:
import alchemy from 'alchemy';

const app = await alchemy('hello-world-do-template');

unsupported.reason: Alchemy uses url: true for workers.dev URLs or domains for custom routes

Alchemy handles migrations automatically with sqlite: true flag

migration_notes: Alchemy automatically manages Durable Object migrations using internal tags
Use sqlite: true flag for Durable Objects with SQLite storage
Routes configuration replaced with url: true for workers.dev URLs
Observability is built into Alchemy and doesn't need explicit configuration
Upload source maps handled automatically by Alchemy build process
